reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and well-made, with good fabric that isn't cheap. The dress fits true to size with a perfect length, and customers appreciate its flattering silhouette, particularly noting it's slimming for curvy figures. They find it comfortable and versatile, with one customer mentioning it works well for outdoor weddings. The neckline receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting it's too low for

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most flattering dress Iâ€™ve bought in a LONG time â¤ï¸
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Iâ€™m 5â€™3â€ and around 160-170, 38DD and I carry most of my weight in my midsection. I usually wear either a Med or Large, but went with a Med in black, based on reviews and photos. It was an almost perfect fit. Purchased it for a dinner with a Hollywood/Red Carpet theme, but didnâ€™t want to spend a ton and wanted something I could wear again (since I donâ€™t have many events to dress up for). This was the first and only purchase I made and it was perfection. I bought a glitter belt to wear on the waist to add more glam for the night and paired it with fancy jewelry. The only thing I wish I had added was maybe an oversized flower near the shoulder for added drama. So many people complimented me and I felt so chic and glamorous. This reminded me of something Kate Middleton would wear, and she was my inspiration for the look I wanted. It was formal but not over the top, it was INCREDIBLY flattering and the fit was just right. Purchasing the dark green next because I loved this dress so so much. It was comfortable (I helped run the event and was in it for hours, even after the dinner was over) and I felt so beautiful in it! (Including a video I originally sent to my friend when doing a trial run before the dinnerâ€¦.be kind, as it was just meant for her to see! ðŸ˜‚ðŸ«£) Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress

items.author: Melissa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but has its flaws
items.body: Pretty dress but definitely has its drawbacks but you get what you pay for. Chiffon is very light on top so the edges of the bra show throughâ€¦.weird slit in front of the left leg which looks like itâ€™s a rip not a slit which totally takes away from the look of the dress. And was so unnecessary. It came delivered folded up in a small bag so will need to have it sent to the dry cleaner to press. The pink is not the pink shown at all it is a dusty rosy beige color. Size is correct and length is to ankle. I am 5â€™6 and weigh 145lbs. Read more
items.author: cathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made
items.body: Loved this dress! Length is perfect and fits well. Dress is made well and the material isnt cheap. Bought this to wear to an evening at the Magic Castle and was great for the occasion. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 38C bust and got it in large blue color. It fit great Read more
items.author: Corina Bernal

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes you feel amazing
items.body: I loved this dress! The only reason I didnâ€™t give it 5 stars was the weird slit on the side. The dress is very elegant and a good fabric however the placement of the slit was off and I had my mom fix it. Will wear again for sure! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Lake Blue, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige White, Grey Blue, Army Green, Dark Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
